reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's ivory color, find it extremely soft, warm, and cozy, and consider it worth the price. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits true to size, others note it runs large. The buttons receive negative feedback, with customers describing them as dreadful. The stitching quality also gets mixed reviews.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan
items.body: Love this sweater so much! Fits perfectly. Beautiful! Love the ivory color! Read more
items.author: Kim Fyfe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite sweater of fall 2025!
items.body: I love this sweater!!! It has become my fall 2025 go to sweater! It’s so soft and cozy and looks really cute with jeans or leggings. I may order it in other colors if they have them! Read more
items.author: Jillian Barkley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but a lil off made
items.body: Sending back, a lil full for xl ! Sad thing was the buttons were really heavy & I wouldn't have been able to wear open. Plus the right side was longer on right side than left when buttoned. Beautiful color but a lil off for me! Read more
items.author: Dianne Odom

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars good material, pretty buttons, akward fitting
items.body: good stretchy material, but the shape is awkward if you plan to button it closed. I got this for my mother who's normal size is a 20-22. I purchased the 22 thinking bigger is better. It fit in the arms but was akward the way it fit and she loves the pretty buttons and wanted to show them off but they hang if the sweater is not buttoned closed so you can't really see how pretty they are. It's a good material- she just doesn't like a slouchy look. Read more
items.author: momotheadmin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fabric and fit
items.body: Nice fabric and fit. Not sure about buttons, I may replace them. Read more
items.author: Jake Urban

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't like the fabric
items.author: sharon

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars I’d pass on this one
items.body: I thought it was going to be perfect for work. I bought my normal size and it’s extremely big. It just looks ill fitting and ugly on. I have tried every which way to style it and nothing does it. Wish i could return but it’s been washed. Read more
items.author: savymid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute sweater
items.body: This sweater is super cute! I love the fit. It's soft and over sized. I love it. Read more
items.author: Peri S.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, Pink, White, Beige, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Camel, Caramel, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
